definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Japan's Mount Fuji, covered with snow, stands amidst the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 日本富士山，山峯高聳入雲，山巔白雪皚皚。

sentences.english: Wisdom was not at the top of the graduate mountain, but there in the sandpile at nursery school.
sentences.chinese: 智慧不在研究生院的山巔之上，而在幼兒園的沙堆裏。

sentences.english: On top of the mount, we see beauty rising with the dawn from the east quietly.
sentences.chinese: 在山巔，我們看見美與辰光一同從東方升起。

sentences.english: The little boy who says "I'll try", will climb to the hill-top.
sentences.chinese: 那個說“我決心嘗試”的小男孩，他將登上山巔。

sentences.english: As we flew over the mountains we could see that there were snowy peaks beneath.
sentences.chinese: 我們飛過羣山時看到了底下被雪覆蓋著的山巔。

sentences.english: The lofty pagoda stands like a giant at the top of the mountain.
The dwarf pushed his black dragon across a range of mountains.
sentences.chinese: 侏儒將他的龍推過山巔。

sentences.english: His office hours were irregular and sometimes held on a> mountaintop.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作時數不合法，有時是在山巔開課。

sentences.english: They won the top of hill by noon.
sentences.chinese: 中午以前他們攀上了山巔。

sentences.english: After climbing the hilltop, you have a panoramic view of mountain scenery.
sentences.chinese: 登上山巔以後，山下的景緻盡收眼底。

sentences.english: Mountaintop removal mining is considered the fastest, most cost-effective way to mine coal reserves.
sentences.chinese: 山巔移除採礦被認爲是最快最省錢的採煤方法。

sentences.english: If you can"t be a pine on the top of the hill".
sentences.chinese: 如果你當不成山巔的一棵勁松。

sentences.english: And let me be Your footsteps, That descend from mountains tall.
sentences.chinese: 我願是您足跡，陪您走下山巔。

sentences.english: More than half of Appalachian coal mining is done by the wrenching mountaintop removal method.
sentences.chinese: 阿帕拉契山脈一半多煤礦都採用山巔移除採礦的方法。

sentences.english: We Will Dance Atop The Mountain !

definition: to gaze afar/to look into the distance
not a sound to be heard (idiom)
lit. ten thousand fathoms/fig. extremely high or deep/lofty/bottomless
